==Trivia==
* {{w|Xipe Totec}} is a God of agriculture, warfare, the East and a member of the {{w|Aztec creator gods|Tezcatlipocas}} in Aztec Religion.
** ''{{wt|totec|Totec}}'' means "our lord" in {{w|Nahuatl}}.
